title: A Place to live: building in Maine
creator_credit: Lumen Bel Productions and Fred James
brief_description: This film shows how Pat and Patsy Hennim of Maine, U.S., adapt different building theories to build their own home in the woods, minimising on costs and maximising on living conditions. In turn they teach their ideas to a group of students.
